turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need you to order a drink for me from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 12th St and Hudson in Hoboken, NJ.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A medium cinnamon shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you mean grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, sorry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great. Which milk would you like in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know you like dairy, so whole or skim.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, skim please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Anything else in your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add some extra cinnamon to the top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, of course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok great, so can you read that off to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, so a grande cinnamon shortbread latte with skim milk and extra cinnamon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is the coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will be 4.45.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok! You can just add it to the tab on my account there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great, so the coffee has been purchased and a confirmation will be sent to your phone via text.
